name: Doctors Orders (WIP)
description:
Join our Plague doctor hero on his quest to prove his skills to all in the art of barding. Enjoy this cross between rhythm games and platformer.  

pre-pre-pre-pre-alpha

sound is on its way (Work in Progress)

please come back when its completed :D

please comment any bugs you find, there will probably be alot

Tutorial and first "Forest" level work, the rest enter at your own risk...

E - Interact/Enter

ENTER - Menu/Pause Menu Confirm

WASD - move

SPACE- jump/continue Conversation

Most Key binds are changeable in the in game pause menu

New game starts at tutorial
If you want to play a specific level go to level select
